title: A Uniquely American Failure, Nirvana’s Naked Baby Problem 8.26.21
itunes:title: A Uniquely American Failure, Nirvana’s Naked Baby Problem 8.26.21
description:
In episode 977, Jack and Miles are joined by White Homework's Tori Williams Douglass to discuss the mainstream media not knowing how to deal, Trump's border wall falling apart, the new vaccine pressure tactic, Erik Prince offering to fly people out of Afghanistan for too much money, the Nirvana Nevermind baby suing, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. More than 10,000 waiting to be evacuated at Kabul airport: US
  2. The narrative of America in retreat is false
  3. Texas to spend $25 million on 2-mile concrete barrier amid Gov. Greg Abbott’s push for a state-funded border wall
  4. Trump’s border wall reportedly in severe disrepair in Arizona
  5. Trump's Border Wall Torn Apart by Arizona Monsoon Rains
  6. Appeals Court Rules Trump's Border Wall Prototypes Can Skip Environmental Oversight
  7. Trump’s border wall, vulnerable to flash floods, needs large storm gates left open for months
  8. Monsoon flooding damages border wall gates in east Arizona
  9. A Texas Sheriff’s Grim Task: Finding Bodies as Migrant Deaths Surge
  10. Delta Air Lines is raising health insurance premiums for unvaccinated employees by $200 a month to cover higher Covid costs
  11. Erik Prince says he’s offering flights out of Afghanistan for $6,500 a person
  12. In Kabul, Private Rescue Efforts Grow Desperate as Time to Evacuate Afghans Runs Out
  13. NIRVANA, KURT COBAIN'S ESTATE BABY'S ALL GROWN UP, NOW HE'S SUING ... 'Nevermind' Art Exploited Me!!!
  14. Vampire Weekend Settle Lawsuit with ‘Contra’ Model
  15. LISTEN: Deb Never & Jim-E Stack - Sweet & Spice (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
